abilities.description: Affects all units in a 350 AoE around the target. All enemies around the target are slowed for 4 seconds. All allies around the target receive a basic dispel, increase their movement speed, and are unslowable for 4 seconds. Both movement speed reduction and increase start at 100% and gradually decrease to 0% over the course of the buff duration.
Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 1 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 8 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
120 mana, 0.5 mana regeneration and 1% flat base magic resistance.
20 and 10 main attack damage to / heroes respectively.
21 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Disperser
description: Weapons Cost 5700 (1000) Sell Value 2850 Active Suppress Passive ? Manabreak Bonus ? +20 Agility +10 Intelligence +45 Attack Damage Shareable Disassemble Usage Alert ? Recipe
trivia: The Manabreak passive used to be called Feedback and got changed at some point without notification.
tips: Because of the way Manabreak interacts with illusions, Disperser is most common and most effective on heroes with easy access to them, such as Phantom Lancer.
